verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> unto my <S%H113>Lord<s%>, <S%H3427>Sit<s%> thou at my right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, Until I <S%H7896>make<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> thy <S%H1916>footstool<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> forth the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: <S%H7287>Rule<s%> thou in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> offer themselves <S%H5071>willingly<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thy <S%H2428>power<s%>, in <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1926>array<s%>: Out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%> of the <S%H4891>morning<s%> Thou hast the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of thy <S%H3208>youth<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, and will not <S%H5162>repent<s%>: Thou art a <S%H3548>priest<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> After the <S%H1700>order<s%> of <S%H4442>Melchizedek<s%>.
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> at thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> Will <S%H4272>strike<s%> through <S%H4428>kings<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath<s%>.

He will <S%H1777>judge<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, He will <S%H4390>fill<s%> the places with dead <S%H1472>bodies<s%>; He will <S%H4272>strike<s%> through the <S%H7218>head<s%> in <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%>.
He will <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>: Therefore will he lift <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%>.
